jobs.title: Sales Engineer - EMEA
jobs.descriptionHtml:
In this role, you will work alongside our Account Executives to help with the technical side of the sales process. You will meet with product teams of SaaS companies to demonstrate how our product solves their challenges, answer any technical questions they have, and build good relationships in the process.

If you are quite technical and at the same time enjoy working with people and helping them solve problems - this job is for you.

 

Responsibilities

  • Directly participate in the sales process from its very start and be responsible for the technical side of it.

  • Give personalized product demos.

  • Answer technical questions.

  • Build relationships with the technical side of the customer's team (product managers, engineers).

  • Manage the PoC process.

  • (Optional) Improve product documentation and other customer-facing artifacts.

  • (Optional) Build prototypes and re-usable examples of integration functionality.

     

Requirements

  • Experience working with SaaS APIs and building integrations, with or without using tools.

  • Understanding of business SaaS space (CRMs, task management, accounting, HR tools).

  • Great verbal English

  • Ability and desire to work autonomously - there will be no manager to tell you what to do every day.

 

Great to have

  • Working knowledge of front-end (react) and backend (node.js) programming.

 

At Integration.app, we value autonomy, proactive alignment, and the drive to get things done every single day. We believe in giving our team the freedom and tools they need to succeed. As a fully remote company, we invest in building personal relationships to enable high-velocity teamwork. This is a unique opportunity to grow with us and shape the future of our company.

jobs.title: Lead AI Engineer: Membrane Agent
jobs.descriptionHtml:
In this role, you will lead development of Pathfinder Agent: our AI agent for building integrations on top of Membrane. You will be responsible for product management (collecting and organizing requirements from internal stakeholders), architecture, and implementation in your area of responsibility.

This job will give you challenging tasks with a lot of autonomy, top-of-market compensation, and meaningful equity in the company.

This role may or may not involve formal management of other engineers, but will involve coordination of multiple people working in your and adjacent areas.

 

Key Responsibilities:

  • Shaping, planning and executing tasks and projects that improve Pathfinder Agent.

  • Designing elegant and practical architecture in alignment with the rest of the product.

  • Working with internal (and occasionally external) stakeholders to inform your direction of work.

  • Ensuring quality of your area of responsibility: documentation, test coverage, technical debt, etc.

 

Requirements:

  • Practical experience building specialized AI agents from scratch. If you know how to build Lovable or OpenAI Agent on top of foundational models - this job is for you.

  • Good understanding of software APIs and integration ecosystem.

 

We value autonomy, proactive alignment, and focus on getting shit done every single day. We hire people who can manage themselves and give you a lot of freedom. We are a fully remote company that invests in building personal relationships to enable effective high-velocity teamwork. We don't spare resources on keeping you happy and productive and don't stand in your way - and we expect you to use this freedom well.

jobs.title: Build Your Own Role
jobs.descriptionHtml:
We are always on a lookout for great people who want to join us on our mission.

We need you to fit two criteria:

  • Be extremely capable in at least one thing that is relevant to our company.

  • Share our values and principles of work.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you.
jobs.descriptionPlain:
We are always on a lookout for great people who want to join us on our mission https://integration.app/about-us.

We need you to fit two criteria:

 - Be extremely capable in at least one thing that is relevant to our company.

 - Share our values and principles https://integration-app.notion.site/Core-Values-Principles-dee665c65c314de1af1fa888eb872d03?pvs=4 of work.

If this sounds like you, we'd love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Lead Product Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
In this role, you will lead development in one of the key parts of our core platform. You will be responsible for product management (collecting and organizing requirements from internal stakeholders), architecture, and implementation in your area of responsibility.

This job will give you challenging tasks with a lot of autonomy, top-of-market compensation, and meaningful equity in the company.

This role may or may not involve formal management of other engineers, but will involve coordination of multiple people working in your and adjacent areas.

 

Key Responsibilities:

  • Shaping, planning and executing tasks and projects that improve your area of our platform.

  • Designing elegant and practical architecture and APIs in alignment with the rest of the product.

  • Working with internal (and occasionally external) stakeholders to inform your direction of work.

  • Ensuring quality of your area of responsibility: documentation, test coverage, technical debt, etc.

 

Requirements:

  • Interest in diving deep into our subject domain (software integrations, developer tools, AI).

  • Proven experience building simple solutions for complex problems.

  • Great working knowledge of Typescript.

  • Working knowledge or interest in quickly learning our technology stack: Kubernetes, Docker, Mongo, Redis, Nestjs, React.

  • Excellent written and fluent spoken communications (in English).

 

We value autonomy, proactive alignment, and focus on getting shit done every single day. We hire people who can manage themselves and give you a lot of freedom. We are a fully remote company that invests in building personal relationships to enable effective high-velocity teamwork. We don't spare resources on keeping you happy and productive and don't stand in your way - and we expect you to use this freedom well.
